scripts.start:ctrl: cd apps/controller-vanillajs && node server.js & sleep 2 && npx open-cli http://localhost:3000
scripts.react-test: concurrently -n "CTRL,R-L,R-H" -c "magenta,cyan,blue" "npm run start:ctrl" "npm run react-light" "npm run react-heavy"
scripts.start:all: npm run clean && concurrently -n "CTRL,A-L,A-H,R-L,R-H,VUE-L,VUE-H,SVE-L,SVE-H" -c "magenta,red,orange,cyan,blue,green,emerald,gold,ivory" "npm run start:ctrl" "npm run angular-light" "npm run angular-heavy" "npm run react-light" "npm run react-heavy" "npm run vue-light" "npm run vue-heavy" "npm run open:browser" "npm run svelte-light" "npm run svelte-heavy"
